title: LoL website is stuck in Dutch for some reason.
body:
I switch the website to English and it still remains as Dutch. I never changed it to Dutch lol.. wth
P.S Forgive for wrong category. I don't know what is what, because I do not understand Dutch.

replies.body:
It's german my friend, not dutch ;-)  

Check your browser language settings, that could help.
I went back into the original LoL website and changed it there, instead of in the boards interface and it worked.

Just switch to

http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/

instead of "de".
